title: Report on Terminal Dwell Time
description: A manager wants to analyze the average time railcars spend in a specific yard (dwell time) to identify inefficiencies.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all railcar arrivals and departures for a specific yard over the last month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the raw data.

tasks.description: For each railcar, calculate the dwell time (departure time - arrival time).
tasks.expected_outcome: The dwell time is calculated for each car.

tasks.description: Calculate the average dwell time for the entire yard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The average dwell time is found to be 28 hours.

tasks.description: Compare the average dwell time to the system target of 24 hours and highlight the negative variance in a performance dashboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager can easily see that the yard is underperforming against its target.
